title: Haven't received star guardian icon.
body:
So yesterday i did the star guardian personality quiz thingy where once upon [completion you could claim your free SG themed icon.](https://puu.sh/rOdmh/10dd71d324.jpg) Today i booted up the game to check my account and  the[ SG icon has still not appeared in it.](http://puu.sh/rPhXy/d16fa7b27b.jpg) Is there a delay with icons being passed on or was the date to get it moved up because i completed the quiz on the 19th when the end date was the 20th. 

Was the date suddenly moved up or is it a case of wait 72 hours and see?

replies.body: Have you selected the **Claim Icon **button to retrieve the icon?  If you retake the test, it should stay you already redeemed it.  Otherwise, you'll need to Claim Icon in order to get it unlocked.  Afterwards, it'll take about 3 days or longer to unlock on the account.  Hope that helps!

Sorry for the delayed response, i was out of town all week. I did hit the claim icon button, roughly 3-4 times as a matter of fact and said it was redeemed. It's been a week now and it did not show up in my account at all.
Hmm it's been 3 days for me... I guess I'll log in after a few hours and check again. Just glad it says I've already claimed the icon.
I did the quiz about 4 times and each time I pressed claim it re-logged me and I had to do the quiz again :/
They asked to give 2-3 days for the summoner icon to appear on your account. If you completed the quiz before the end date, I'm sure you will get it. It took a few days to pop up on my account.
